title: Skillbeschreibung broken xD

embed.description: ''The Eye is blind to fear, to hate, to love - to all things that would sway equilibrium.'' Leader of a secret clan of mystic warriors, Shen serves as the Eye of Twilight, entrusted to enforce equilibrium in the world.

body:
Und vollgas!

Twilight Assault - Shen recalls his spirit blade and draws it. Enemies it collides with are slowed by 2% when moving away from Shen for the next 30/50/70/90/110 seconds. Shen's next 35 attacks deal 5/5.5/6/6.5/7 (+2% Ability Power)% of their target's max health as bonus magic damage. 

Ein Q -> 35 Angriffe verstärkt...nice^^ 

Bitte um Korrektur :) ...oder nachpatchen XD

replies.body:
Neuer Shen meta build:

{{item:3115}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3022}} <- weil er nur ein 2%igen slow hat :D
Sweet! Bei 35x Zusatzdmg brauch ich viel AttSpd um das effizient nutzen zu kÃ¶nnen XD
